title: You can't get hit for 3 sixes in an over, says MS Dhoni on Axar Patel
text: Dharamsala, Oct 3: India captain MS Dhoni said that two or three bad overs that saw too many boundaries being leaked cost them the first Twenty20 International against South Africa here. Scorecard; Report; Series guide Indian bowlers were unable to defend Â»
